sentences.sContent: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.sCn: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.sContent: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.sCn: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.sContent: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.sCn: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

synos.tran: 同时的；联立的；同时发生的

phrases.pCn: 同时处理；同时模拟输入设备

remMethod.val: simul(相同)+taneous(…的) → 同时发生的

words.tran: 同时；[计][力] 同时性；同时发生

trans.tranOther: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time
